lead_paragraph: PELL--Beatrice Lynette (nee Harber), 95, of Somers, NY, died peacefully in her sleep on January 28, 2016. She is survived by Leonard Pell, her devoted husband of 74 years, dear sister Ruth Drucker (Bernard Gross) of Fort Lee, NJ, beloved children JoAnn Pearlman (Neil) of Somers, NY, Diane Maude Brossoie of Montross, Virginia, and Owen Pell (Pearl) of New York City, and cherished grandchildren and great-grandchildren Seth Pearlman (Jamie), Melissa Miller (Jonathan), James Brossoie, Jason Harris, Nathan Pell, Adam Pell, and Samantha Pearlman, Michelle Pearlman, Maxwell Miller, David Miller, and Alaric Puebla. Bea's energy, intelligence, humor and zest for life were apparent to all who knew her. Her family and friends will miss her deeply, and remember her with great love and affection. Services will be held at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 21 West Broad Street, Mount Vernon, NY on Sunday, January 31, 2016 at 10:00am. 1/3
